Name: Evocation
About the game: Description Evocation - is a colorful, hardcore platformer that will make you sweat. The main thing you need to overcome all obstacles is perseverance and reaction. You will be placed in the simulation to go through the database protection system, you will need to rely on your speed and will. Gaps, walls, platforms, lasers, spinning traps and a lot more. You're a hack program after all.. Features 6 colorful and challenging levels to play with your nerves Original soundtrack for each level Additional gain and modification of basic mechanics Controls W A S D - move SHIFT - sprint. (hold SHIFT for more boost/SHIFT only - walk) SPACEBAR - jump. (hold for higher jump)
Meta Title: Evocation: Aug 30, 2018, AKV7 and Full Overview
